mapper.select: select (select app_user.user_name from app_user where fy_purchase.staff_id=app_user.dd_user_id)user_name, (SELECT fy_purchase_supplier_contract.sign_status FROM fy_purchase_supplier_contract WHERE fy_purchase_supplier_contract.purchase_id=fy_purchase.id)contract_statu, GROUP_CONCAT((SELECT bd_supplier.`name` FROM bd_supplier WHERE bd_supplier.pk_supplier=fy_purchase_detail.quote_id))suplier_name, fy_purchase.* FROM fy_purchase_supplier_contract,fy_purchase LEFT JOIN fy_purchase_detail ON fy_purchase.id=fy_purchase_detail.fy_purchase_id WHERE fy_purchase.buy_channel_id!=1 AND fy_purchase.buy_channel_id!=2 AND fy_purchase.`status`=7 GROUP BY fy_purchase.id
